# Remote Work Policy

## Purpose

This policy outlines the expectations and responsibilities for employees who work remotely.

## Eligibility

Full‑time employees who have been with the company for at least 90 days may request remote work.

## Equipment and Security

The company will provide a laptop and must approve any additional hardware.

## Work Hours

Remote employees must be reachable during core business hours (9 am – 5 pm).

## Communication

All remote workers must attend daily stand‑up meetings via video call.
